name: XQEMU
tagline: An experimental emulator for the original Xbox
body:
### About
XQEMU is a open source, cross-platform emulator for the original Xbox (and [Sega Chihiro](http://segaretro.org/Sega_Chihiro)). It is currently in very early stages of development. XQEMU is built on-top of [QEMU](http://www.qemu.org).

Come chat with us **about development topics** in #xqemu on irc.freenode.net

### Status
* Most graphics are broken
* Everything is slow
* No audio
* No networking

### Hack
For now, it's complicated. See [Getting Started](https://github.com/espes/xqemu/wiki/Getting-Started)

### Screenshots
These mostly represent the _absolute best_ of what can currently be made to run and _is not_ representative of most titles.
